Mailing Address: PO Box 22087Capri Post OfficeKelowna, BC     V1Y 9N9
Volunteer Coordinator: Sonja Menyes, Manager of Volunteers/Development Officer; Email: sonja@kelownagospelmission.ca
Service Details: - Provides food, shelter, recovery and care for those in need- Provides meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks) - Men's and women's emergency shelter- Thrift store- Work clothes and boots may be available- Dental clinic- Two women's recovery houses- Street level services- Outreach workers- Haircuts- Chiropractors- Showers and laundry facilities available- Kennels available for client pets- Secure area available for client belongings, e.g. shopping carts or bicycles
Hours: Office hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 4:00pm (but shelter staff on site 24/7)
Eligibility: Children may attend meals under supervision of their parents or guardian
Address & Map: 251 Leon AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 6J1View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Partially Accessible - main floor only; dorms and dental clinic are on second floor
